newsitem.title: JAPAN: PRESS DIGEST - TOP JAPAN BUSINESS NEWS - AUG 7.
newsitem.headline: PRESS DIGEST - TOP JAPAN BUSINESS NEWS - AUG 7.

text.p: Following are some of the leading stories in the Japanese press on Thursday, as reported by Kyodo news agency:
-- International financial support for Thai economic recovery mounts to $20 billion.
-- Microsoft Corp plans to invest $150 million in Apple Computer Inc.
-- Mitsubishi Motors Corp to assemble passenger cars for Asia in Thailand.
-- South Korean Foreign Ministry says 29 found alive after crash of Korean Air Lines 747.
-- Defence Agency to cut spending on major weapons system under current five-year defence programme.
-- Patent Office eyes raising penalty up to 100 million yen from current five million yen for firms infringing on patents.
